short_summary: This Request for Proposal is for the services of a Contractor to install police identity marking decals on police vehicles.
description: The Police Service is seeking the services of a Contractor to install police identity marking decals on police vehicles. This is a multi-vehicle, multi-service procurement. The Contract duration is not specified.
full_summary:
# Notice
## Title: Services of a Contractor to Install Police Identity Marking Decals on Police Vehicles
### French Title: Des services d’un entrepreneur pour apposer des décalques de marquage sur les véhicules de police
## General Information
* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01025666
* **Solicitation Number**: 202302057/B
* **Publication Date**: 2023-02-13
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-02-16T17:00:00

## Description of Requirement
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the services of a Contractor to install police identity marking decals on approximately 250-300 vehicles per year. The services are required on various vehicle platforms and must be provided "as and when" requested, at the Contractor's location. There are security requirements associated with this requirement, which can be found in the Request for Proposal documents.

## Bidding Process
The Proposed Procurement consists of two phases:
### Phase 1: Submission of Interest
To participate in this requirement, Interested Bidders must complete the attached SUBMISSION OF INTEREST form, along with the ANNEX B - NON-DISCLOSURE AND CONFIDENTIALITY OF INFORMATION AGREEMENT, and send it via email to the Contracting Authority. The submission of interest will be the only accepted means for Interested Bidders to express interest in the requirement. Submissions of interest received after the NPP closing date will not be considered.

### Phase 2: Request for Proposal
After the NPP closing date, the Contracting Authority will send the solicitation package, including specifications and associated documentation, directly to Interested Bidders who submitted a duly completed SUBMISSION OF INTEREST form.

## Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation will be based on the lowest priced, compliant proposal.

## Important Notes
* Canada reserves the right to modify, change, or terminate the Proposed Procurement at its sole discretion.
* Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* The Contracting Authority will send the solicitation package directly to Interested Bidders via email.

## Contact Information
For any questions regarding this Proposed Procurement, please submit an email to the Contracting Authority, Gursharn Dhadwal, at gursharn.dhadwal@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. Additional information can be found on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS). Canada will post all amendments, including any enquiries and replies, on GETS. [
